profiles.name: Alex P. Wick ✓
profiles.summary:
Head of Sales & Marketing @ LEADxperience 🧲✓ | #MrLXP | End-to-End Lead Management: From Identification to Closing Deals | Better Leads. Bigger Wins. All LXP. | 💬 🇩🇪 & 🇺🇸 | +49 155 61621070 | leadxperience.de · 𝑰 𝑨𝑴 𝑨𝑳𝑬𝑿 – Your Partner in Smarter Sales and Marketing Success

With 20 years of global experience, I’ve worn many hats: engineer, strategist, marketer, and now, Head of Sales & Marketing at LEADxperience (LXP). From mastering Print & Media Technologies to redefining sales, my career is about one thing: turning potential into measurable success.

Today, I’m "Mr. LXP" – the face of a SaaS platform that doesn’t just identify leads; it transforms them into actionable opportunities.

𝑾𝒉𝒂𝒕 𝑫𝒓𝒊𝒗𝒆𝒔 𝑴𝒆?

➤ 𝐕𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐁𝐞𝐲𝐨𝐧𝐝 𝐁𝐨𝐫𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬: I design solutions that empower businesses of all sizes to expand across industries and reach new markets global
